items.text: length outside off, steers it to third-man, there's some excitement as that was briefly in the air but pretty safe, to third man's left for one
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for one
full and angled across, Taylor pushes it to the bowler's left but Mehidy does well to get across and keep him on strike
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run
Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: length outside off, hint of room and that's good enough for Taylor to cut it away past point and to deep cover's left for two
short outside off, he cuts harder but straighter and only a single to deep cover that time
length outside off, he looks to cut, gets it almost off the bottom of the bat but beats point and collects four
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off, Taylor walks into the stroke and pushes it to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length outside off, cut away to third man for one
length outside off, waits for it and steers it past point and down to third-man for one
length outside off, chopped away to third-man for one
fuller and gets it to cut away off the pitch, beats Williamson's outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: full on middle, skips down the wicket and works it towards midwicket for one
slower on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for one
short outside off, punched to cover where the fielder does well, diving to his left and keeping Williamson on strike
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Williamson, no run

items.text: full on the pads, nudged towards deep square leg for one
pulls his length back, on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: short and angled across, Williamson sways out of the way
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: full outside off, Williamson leans into it and drives it crisply to deep cover's right for two
length, angled across, Williamson pushes it to point
short outside off, Taylor goes up and over point and find the boundary to bring up a quickfire fifty
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.preText: SarfBD: "Bangladesh's body language looks a little bit down. Even though, a victory is becoming more unlikely, the match is not over yet. At least they should try to make New Zealand play as many overs as possible so that the damage is minimized. Mashrafe needs to gather his troops around and inspire them. It's long tournament and every ball counts. "
items.text: full on the pads, clipped away to deep square leg's left for a couple
short one, angled across, Taylor sways out of its way and it's called wide any way
